title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max helps a rebellious woman fight tyranny.
